title: The Nile Hilton Incident
plot: Set against the backdrop of the Egyptian Revolution, the thriller features a police officer who investigates the murder of a woman. What initially seems to be a killing of a prostitute turns into a more complicated case involving the very elite of Egypt.
stars: Fares Fares, Mari Malek, Yasser Ali Maher, Ahmed Selim

plotShort.plainText:
The Nile Hilton Incident
The Nile Hilton Incident (Arabic: حادث النيل هيلتون‎ Hadith Alnayl Ilitun) is a 2017 Swedish thriller film directed by Tarik Saleh. It was screened in the World Cinema Dramatic Competition section of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. It was awarded the World Cinema Grand Jury Prize: Dramatic. The film discusses the corruption of Egyptian police before the 25 January Revolution. The plot is inspired by the murder of the Lebanese Arab singer Suzanne Tamim in Dubai in 2008. At the 53rd Guldbagge Awards, the film won five awards, including Best Film.

The Nile Hilton Incident

It was screened in the World Cinema Dramatic Competition section of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. It was awarded the World Cinema Grand Jury Prize: Dramatic. The film discusses the corruption of Egyptian police before the 25 January Revolution. The plot is inspired by the murder of the Lebanese Arab singer Suzanne Tamim in Dubai in 2008. At the 53rd Guldbagge Awards, the film won five awards, including Best Film.

plotFull.plainText:
The Nile Hilton Incident
The Nile Hilton Incident (Arabic: حادث النيل هيلتون‎ Hadith Alnayl Ilitun) is a 2017 Swedish thriller film directed by Tarik Saleh. It was screened in the World Cinema Dramatic Competition section of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. It was awarded the World Cinema Grand Jury Prize: Dramatic. The film discusses the corruption of Egyptian police before the 25 January Revolution. The plot is inspired by the murder of the Lebanese Arab singer Suzanne Tamim in Dubai in 2008. At the 53rd Guldbagge Awards, the film won five awards, including Best Film.
Cast
Fares Fares as Noredin Mostafa
Mari Malek as Salwa
Yasser Ali Maher as Kammal Mostafa
Ahmed Selim as Hatem Shafiq
Hania Amar as Gina
Mohamed Yousry as Momo
Slimane Dazi as Green Eyed Man
Hichem Yacoubi as Nagui
Ger Duany as Clinton
Reception
On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 90% based on 38 reviews, and an average rating of 7/10. On Metacritic, which assigns normalized rating to reviews, the film has a weighted average score of 70 out of 100, based on 8 critics, indicating "generally favorable reviews".
plotFull.html:
The Nile Hilton Incident

The Nile Hilton Incident (Arabic: حادث النيل هيلتون‎ Hadith Alnayl Ilitun) is a 2017 Swedish thriller film directed by Tarik Saleh. It was screened in the World Cinema Dramatic Competition section of the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. It was awarded the World Cinema Grand Jury Prize: Dramatic. The film discusses the corruption of Egyptian police before the 25 January Revolution. The plot is inspired by the murder of the Lebanese Arab singer Suzanne Tamim in Dubai in 2008. At the 53rd Guldbagge Awards, the film won five awards, including Best Film.


Cast

  • Fares Fares as Noredin Mostafa
  • Mari Malek as Salwa
  • Yasser Ali Maher as Kammal Mostafa
  • Ahmed Selim as Hatem Shafiq
  • Hania Amar as Gina
  • Mohamed Yousry as Momo
  • Slimane Dazi as Green Eyed Man
  • Hichem Yacoubi as Nagui
  • Ger Duany as Clinton

Reception

On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 90% based on 38 reviews, and an average rating of 7/10. On Metacritic, which assigns normalized rating to reviews, the film has a weighted average score of 70 out of 100, based on 8 critics, indicating "generally favorable reviews".

similars.title: Tommy
similars.plot: A week before Christmas, Estelle lands at Arlanda Airport. A year earlier, she had left Stockholm on the run with her husband Tommy and their daughter, after Tommy had taken part in one of ... See full summary »
similars.stars: Moa Gammel, Lykke Li, Ola Rapace

similars.title: Gitmo
similars.plot: Looks at the link between Guantanomo Bay and the torture methods used in Iraq. How US forces handle the task of retrieving information from the detainees. Ex detainee Mehdi from Sweden breaks his vow of silence.

similars.title: Metropia
similars.plot: A complex story of a misaligned man, though good intent, creating a nightmarish Dystopian existence.
similars.stars: Vincent Gallo, Juliette Lewis, Udo Kier

similars.title: Journal 64
similars.plot: A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution.
similars.stars: Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Fares Fares, Johanne Louise Schmidt

similars.title: The Party
similars.plot: Janet (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) hosts a party to celebrate her new promotion, but once the guests arrive, it becomes clear that not everything is going to go down as smoothly as the red wine.
similars.stars: Timothy Spall, Kristin Scott Thomas, Patricia Clarkson

similars.title: Over the Hill
similars.plot: Mae Marsh stars as the mother of two children. Marsh gives her boys everything they desire, at great cost to herself. She is forced to work in one menial job after another so that her children will never go without.
similars.stars: Mae Marsh, James Dunn, Sally Eilers

similars.title: Una golfa
similars.plot: Trumpet-player in a club band falls for a streety young woman.
similars.stars: Silvia Pinal, Sergio Bustamante, Jorge Martínez de Hoyos

similars.title: Segen der Erde
similars.plot: After the Nobel prize winning Knut Hamsun-novel, with it's criticism of industrialization, urbanizing and loss of values. The farmer Isak makes a farm out of barren soil, together with Inger and their two sons. She kills the third.
similars.stars: Amund Rydland, Karen Poulsen, Ragna Wettergreen

similars.title: In Love and War
similars.plot: In 1944, the family lives of three San Francisco Marines are affected by their personal experiences on the front lines in the Pacific and vice-versa.
similars.stars: Robert Wagner, Dana Wynter, Jeffrey Hunter

similars.title: Partisan
similars.plot: Set in the idyllic surroundings of Jordnära, a gated community that runs a very successful organic farm. A man takes a job offer, soon learning about their unorthodox rules and routines.
similars.stars: Fares Fares, Johan Rheborg, Anna Björk

similars.title: May God Save Us
similars.plot: Inspectors Velarde and Alfaro must find what appears to be a serial killer. This hunt against the clock will make them realize something they'd never thought about: neither one of them is that different from the killer.
similars.stars: Antonio de la Torre, Roberto Álamo, Javier Pereira

similars.title: Better Things
similars.plot: A group of young people grow up together in a small, rural community in the Cotswolds.
similars.stars: Rachel McIntyre, Emma Cooper, Liam McIlfatrick
